keyMoments.title: Nami Prepares to Bathe
keyMoments.description: Nami decides to take a bath in Hogback's mansion despite the creepy surroundings, asking Usopp and Chopper to stand guard.
keyMoments.significance: Sets up one of Nami's most vulnerable moments in the series.
keyMoments.quote: You two stand guard outside while I take a bath.

keyMoments.title: Attacked by Absalom
keyMoments.description: Nami is assaulted by the invisible Absalom while bathing, who declares his intention to make her his bride. She defends herself by kicking him.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Nami as Absalom's primary target throughout the Thriller Bark arc, leading to her later kidnapping and forced wedding ceremony.

keyMoments.title: Surrounded by Surprise Zombies
keyMoments.description: Nami, along with Usopp and Chopper, becomes surrounded by the Surprise Zombies emerging from paintings and mounted heads.
keyMoments.significance: Forces Nami to fight alongside the mansion trio against overwhelming odds.

relationships.description: Absalom becomes obsessed with Nami and attacks her with the intention of making her his bride, establishing a predator-prey dynamic.

evolutionMoments.description: Absalom attacks Nami in the bathroom and declares his intention to make her his bride.

keyMoments.title: Defends Nami from Absalom
keyMoments.description: Hearing Nami's screams, Usopp rushes into the bathroom with Chopper to defend her from the invisible attacker, showing bravery despite his usual cowardice.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Usopp's growth and loyalty to his crewmates.

keyMoments.title: Fires Exploding Star Signal
keyMoments.description: Usopp fires an Exploding Star to alert the other Straw Hats of danger, showing quick thinking.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Usopp's resourcefulness in crisis situations.

keyMoments.title: Discovers Zombie Weakness to Fire
keyMoments.description: Usopp discovers that the Surprise Zombies fear fire and uses candlelight as a weapon, setting parts of the room ablaze in the process.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals a critical weakness of Thriller Bark's zombies that becomes important throughout the arc.

name.japanese: トニートニー・チョッパー

keyMoments.title: Defends Nami from Absalom
keyMoments.description: Chopper rushes to defend Nami from the invisible attacker alongside Usopp, showing his protective nature.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Chopper's bravery despite his fearful personality.

keyMoments.title: Battles Surprise Zombies
keyMoments.description: Chopper fights alongside Nami and Usopp against the army of Surprise Zombies in the mansion.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Chopper's combat abilities in a horror scenario.

keyMoments.title: Lands on Thriller Bark Island
keyMoments.description: Luffy and his group finally set foot on the main Thriller Bark island, beginning their exploration.
keyMoments.significance: Marks the start of Luffy's main adventure on Thriller Bark.

keyMoments.title: Encounter with Cerberus
keyMoments.description: Luffy meets the three-headed dog Cerberus and immediately tries to pet it, showing his fearless nature.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Luffy's approach to danger with curiosity rather than fear.

keyMoments.title: Uses Gomu Gomu no Mushitoriami
keyMoments.description: Luffy uses an anime-original technique, Gomu Gomu no Mushitoriami (Bug-Catching Net), to punch Cerberus after it bites him.
keyMoments.significance: Debuts a new variation of Luffy's Gomu Gomu abilities.

keyMoments.title: Tries to Recruit Zombie Creatures
keyMoments.description: Luffy captures a zombie unicorn and sentient tree, excitedly asking them to join his crew, annoying Zoro and Sanji.
keyMoments.significance: Continues Luffy's running gag of trying to recruit unusual creatures.

abilities.description: An anime-original technique where Luffy stretches his arms in a net-like formation to capture or punch enemies.

keyMoments.title: Attacks Nami in the Bathroom
keyMoments.description: Absalom uses his Suke Suke no Mi invisibility powers to attack Nami while she bathes, declaring his intention to make her his bride.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Absalom's predatory obsession with Nami and sets up his role as a major antagonist in the arc.

keyMoments.title: Meets with Hogback and Perona
keyMoments.description: Absalom joins Hogback and Perona to discuss strategies for dealing with the Straw Hat Pirates.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the coordination between the Mysterious Four members.

affiliations.role: Commander of Soldier Zombies and General Zombies

relationships.description: Absalom becomes obsessed with Nami and seeks to force her to become his bride.

evolutionMoments.description: Absalom attacks Nami and declares his intention to marry her.

reveals.information: Absalom desires to make Nami his bride and is willing to use force

keyMoments.title: Alerted to the Straw Hats' Actions
keyMoments.description: Hogback hears Usopp's Exploding Star and realizes the Straw Hats are active in his mansion.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Hogback becoming aware of the threat the Straw Hats pose.

keyMoments.title: Convenes Meeting with Absalom and Perona
keyMoments.description: Hogback meets with fellow Mysterious Four members Absalom and Perona to strategize about the Straw Hat invasion.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Hogback's leadership role in organizing the defense of Thriller Bark.

keyMoments.title: Meets with Hogback and Absalom
keyMoments.description: Perona joins the strategic meeting with Hogback and Absalom to discuss how to handle the Straw Hat Pirates.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Perona's involvement in Thriller Bark's defense planning.

affiliations.role: Commander of Wild Zombies and Surprise Zombies

keyMoments.title: Buhichuck Attacks the Trio
keyMoments.description: Buhichuck, the pig-headed zombie leader of the Surprise Zombies, attacks Nami, Usopp, and Chopper by throwing swords from his wall-mounted position.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces a named antagonist among the Surprise Zombies.

abilities.description: Buhichuck uses his concealed hands to throw swords mounted below him at enemies.

reveals.information: Buhichuck is zombie number 298 and the leader of the Surprise Zombies in Hogback's dining room

keyMoments.title: Lands on Thriller Bark Island
keyMoments.description: Zoro arrives on Thriller Bark island with Luffy's group.
keyMoments.significance: Begins Zoro's Thriller Bark adventure.

keyMoments.title: Lands on Thriller Bark Island
keyMoments.description: Sanji arrives on Thriller Bark island with Luffy's group.
keyMoments.significance: Begins Sanji's Thriller Bark adventure.

keyMoments.title: Lands on Thriller Bark Island
keyMoments.description: Robin arrives on Thriller Bark island with Luffy's group.
keyMoments.significance: Begins Robin's Thriller Bark adventure.

keyMoments.title: Lands on Thriller Bark Island
keyMoments.description: Franky arrives on Thriller Bark island with Luffy's group.
keyMoments.significance: Begins Franky's Thriller Bark adventure.
